name: spo-delete-expired-sharing-link-folder-file-item
title: Deletes expired and older sharing links for folder, file and item in SharePoint
shortDescription: Deletes expired and older sharing links for folder, file, and item. Currently expired or older sharing links are not automatically deleted
longDescription: Currently, there is no default expiry time for 'people you choose' or 'people in your organization' links, and expired links are not automatically deleted. Using this script can help clean up your environment by removing expired or older sharing links, thereby enhancing security and governance.

references.name: Want to learn more about PnP PowerShell and the cmdlets
references.description: Check out the PnP PowerShell site to get started and for the reference to the cmdlets.
